Portuguese: Ótimo! Então estarei aguardando aqui!

English: No problem, just come back!
Portuguese: Não tem problema, é só voltar!

English: Great! I expected no less from you. Here’s your reward.
Portuguese: Ótimo! Não esperava menos de você. Aqui está sua recompensa.

English: Reach level 80
Portuguese: Alcance o nível 80

English: Master Grade (3)
Portuguese: Grau Mestre (3 de 6)

English: The last time you finished your task in no time. What do you think? Let’s go back?
Portuguese: Da última vez você terminou sua tarefa rapidamente. O que você acha? Gostaria de continuar se provando?

English: The rules are not changing, so what are we waiting for?
Portuguese: As regras são as mesmas, então o que estamos esperando?

English: This time, it will be from level 80 to 90! So, shall we go?
Portuguese: Desta vez, será do nível 80 ao 90! Tudo certo para ir?

English: Reach level 90
Portuguese: Alcance o nível 90

English: Master Grade (4)
Portuguese: Grau Mestre (4 de 6)

English: We’re almost done, don’t worry. But for now, let’s keep going?
Portuguese: Estamos quase terminando, não se preocupe. Mas por enquanto, vamos continuar?

English: And yes, as usual, same rules!
Portuguese: Ah sim, mesmas regras!

English: This time, it will be from level 90 to 100! So, shall we go?
Portuguese: Agora será do nível 90 ao 100! Então, vamos?

English: Reach level 100
Portuguese: Alcance o nível 100

English: Master Grade (5)
Portuguese: Grau Mestre (5 de 6)

English: One more and then it’s the last!
Portuguese: Você está indo muito bem, está muito perto da última provação!

English: This time, it will be from level 100 to 110! So, shall we go?
Portuguese: Desta vez, será do nível 100 ao 110! Então, devemos continuar?

English: Reach level 110
Portuguese: Chegue ao nível 110 em seu personagem.

English: Master Grade (6)
Portuguese: Grau Mestre (Final)

English: Here we are! This is one of the last missions I have for you at the moment. Are you still motivated?
Portuguese: Aqui estamos nós! Esta é a última missão de provação que tenho para você no momento. Você ainda está motivado?

English: This time, it will be from level 110 to 120! So, shall we go?
Portuguese: Esta última parte será do nível 110 ao 120! Preparado(a)?

English: Reach level 120
Portuguese: Alcance o nível 120

English: Clockworks War
Portuguese: A Grande Guerra de Clockworks

English: Christmas Spirit
Portuguese: Espírito Natalino

English: It’s almost Christmas, as you know. And I forgot to prepare my snowman...
Portuguese: Está quase chegando o Natal, como você sabe. E eu esqueci de preparar meu boneco de neve...

English: Can you get me $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,2$ snowballs and $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ carrots before midnight ?
Portuguese: Você pode me trazer $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,2$ bolas de neve e $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ cenouras antes da meia-noite?

English: You can find the snowballs on the ground, but I think all the monsters picked them up... So you’ll have to eliminate a few to get them back.
Portuguese: Você pode encontrar as bolas de neve no chão, mas eu acho que muitos monstros as pegaram... Então você terá que eliminá-los para recuperá-las.

English: If you’re not interested in the Christmas spirit, it’s useless.
Portuguese: Se você não está interessado no espírito de Natal, é inútil.

English: You did it! Thanks to you Christmas is saved! Unless the monsters destroy the snowmen and take back the carrots...
Portuguese: Você conseguiu! Graças a você, o Natal está salvo! A menos que os monstros destruam os bonecos de neve e recuperem as cenouras...

English: Well, I guess picking up snow and carrots is too hard for you, huh...
Portuguese: Bem, eu acho que pegar neve e cenouras é muito difícil para você, não é mesmo...

English: The polar bear asked me to bring back $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,2$ snowballs and $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ carrots by midnight.
Portuguese: O urso polar me pediu para trazer $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,2$ bolas de neve e $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ cenouras até a meia-noite.

English: Welcome hero! Another request has come in to clear out $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ from the Forsaken Tower. Could you please slay 50 $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and return to me once you are done?
Portuguese: Bem-vindo aventureiro! Chegou mais um pedido de $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ da Torre Abandonada.Você poderia conseguir 60 $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ e trazê-los para mim?

English: Well done, we'll have plenty of $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$s to fulfill all the requests!
Portuguese: Muito bem, precisaremos de bastante $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ para atender a todos os pedidos!

English: You haven't defeated the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ yet? That's okay, just return once you have.
Portuguese: Você ainda não conseguiu os $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$? Tudo bem, apenas retorne assim que os tiver.

English: Welcome back hero! There are reports of a new threat in the Forsaken Tower. Please seek out and get rid of the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$.
Portuguese: Bem-vindo de volta aventureiro! Há relatos de uma nova ameaça na Torre Abandonada. Procure e livre-se de $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$.

English: Thank you hero, the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ threat has been eliminated.
Portuguese: Obrigado aventureiro, a ameaça $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ foi eliminada.

English: You weren't able to kill the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ yet? That's alright, please return after you've won against the giant!
Portuguese: Você ainda não conseguiu matar o $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$? Tudo bem, por favor, volte depois de vencer o gigante!

English: The Tower is filled with dangerous masquerpets. I understand if you do not wish to take the risk.
Portuguese: A Torre está infestada de masquerpets perigosos. Entendo se não quiser correr o risco.

English: Curiosity Killed the Cat (1)
Portuguese: A Curiosidade Matou o Gato (1)

English: Curiosity Killed the Cat (2)
Portuguese: A Curiosidade Matou o Gato (2)

English: Light as a Feather (1)
Portuguese: Leve como uma Pena (1)

English: Light as a Feather (2)
Portuguese: Leve como uma Pena (2)

English: Gullah Gullah Island! (1)
Portuguese: Ilha Gullah Gullah! (1)

English: Gullah Gullah Island! (2)
Portuguese: Ilha Gullah Gullah! (2)

English: Abraxas Antitoxin (1)
Portuguese: Antitoxina de Abraxas (1)

English: Abraxas Antitoxin (2)
Portuguese: Antitoxina de Abraxas (2)

English: Witch in the Tower (1)
Portuguese: Bruxa na Torre (1)

English: Witch in the Tower (2)
Portuguese: Bruxa na Torre (2)

English: Bird Assassins (1)
Portuguese: Pássaros Assassinos (1)

English: Bird Assassins (2)
Portuguese: Pássaros Assassinos (2)

English: Minotaur Maze (1)
Portuguese: Labirinto do Minotauro (1)

English: Minotaur Maze (2)
Portuguese: Labirinto do Minotauro (2)

English: Bead of the Black Magician (1)
Portuguese: Conta do Mago Negro (1)

Portuguese: Conta do Mago Negro (2)

English: Keys for the Piano (1)
Portuguese: Keys for the Piano (1)

Portuguese: Coração de Ferro (1)

Portuguese: Coração de Ferro (2)

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Catsy.
Portuguese: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ cai de qualquer tipo de Catsy.

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Harpy.
Portuguese: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ cai de qualquer tipo de Harpy.

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Gullah.
Portuguese: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ cai de qualquer tipo de Gullah.

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Abraxas.
Portuguese: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ cai de qualquer tipo de Abraxas.

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Hague.
Portuguese: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ cai de qualquer tipo de Hague.

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Tengu.
Portuguese: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ cai de qualquer tipo de Tengu.

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Asterius.
Portuguese: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ cai de qualquer tipo de Asterius.

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Dantalian.
Portuguese: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ cai de qualquer tipo de Dantalian.

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Gannessa.
Portuguese: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ cai de qualquer tipo de Gannessa.

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Asuras.
Portuguese: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ cai de qualquer tipo de Asuras.

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the first floor of the Forsaken Tower.
Portuguese: $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ teve sua localização revelada no primeiro andar da Torre Abandonada.

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the second floor of the Forsaken Tower.
Portuguese: $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ teve sua localização revelada no segundo andar da Torre Abandonada.

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the third floor of the Forsaken Tower.
Portuguese: $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ teve sua localização revelada no terceiro andar da Torre Abandonada.

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the fourth floor of the Forsaken Tower.
Portuguese: $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ teve sua localização revelada no quarto andar da Torre Abandonada.

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the fifth floor of the Forsaken Tower.
Portuguese: $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ teve sua localização revelada no quinto andar da Torre Abandonada.

English: Clockworks War (Medium)
Portuguese: Guerra de Clockworks (Médio)

English: Clockworks War (Hard)
Portuguese: Guerra de Clockworks (Difícil)

English: Meteonyker
Portuguese: Meteonyker

English: Meteonyker (Medium)
Portuguese: Meteonyker (Médio)

English: Meteonyker (Hard)
Portuguese: Meteonyker (Difícil)

English: Forsaken Tower Daily Quests
Portuguese: Missões Diárias da Torre Abandonada

English: Dungeon Card Reward
Portuguese: Recompensa do Cartão da Masmorra

English: Weapon Piercing Box (D)
Portuguese: Caixa de Perfuração de Arma (D)

English: Weapon Piercing Box (C)
Portuguese: Caixa de Perfuração de Arma (C)

English: Weapon Piercing Box (B)
Portuguese: Caixa de Perfuração de Arma (B)

English: Weapon Piercing Box (A)
Portuguese: Caixa de Perfuração de Arma (A)

English: Welcome hero! Another request has come in to clear out the boss masquerpets within Madrigal's dungeons. Could you please slay 5 dungeon bosses, and return to me once you are done?
Portuguese: Bem-vindo herói! Recebemos outro pedido para limpar os chefes masquerpets das masmorras de Madrigal. Você poderia eliminar 5 chefes de masmorra e retornar a mim quando terminar?

English: Welcome hero! Another request has come in to clear out the boss masquerpets within Madrigal's dungeons. Could you please slay 20 dungeon bosses on Hard or higher difficulty, and return to me once you are done?
Portuguese: Bem-vindo herói! Recebemos outro pedido para limpar os chefes masquerpets das masmorras de Madrigal. Você poderia eliminar 20 chefes de masmorra na dificuldade Difícil ou superior e retornar a mim quando terminar?

English: Welcome hero! Another request has come in to clear out the boss masquerpets within Madrigal's dungeons. Could you please slay 35 dungeon bosses on Extra Hard or higher difficulty, and return to me once you are done?
Portuguese: Bem-vindo herói! Recebemos outro pedido para limpar os chefes masquerpets das masmorras de Madrigal. Você poderia eliminar 35 chefes de masmorra na dificuldade Extra Difícil ou superior e retornar a mim quando terminar?

English: Welcome hero! Another request has come in to clear out the boss masquerpets within Madrigal's dungeons. Could you please slay 50 dungeon bosses on Nightmare or higher difficulty, and return to me once you are done?
Portuguese: Bem-vindo herói! Recebemos outro pedido para limpar os chefes masquerpets das masmorras de Madrigal. Você poderia eliminar 50 chefes de masmorra na dificuldade Pesadelo ou superior e retornar a mim quando terminar?

English: Collect souls from boss masquerpets at the end of any dungeon 5 times, and return to me for a reward.
Portuguese: Colete almas de chefes masquerpets no final de qualquer masmorra 5 vezes e retorne a mim para uma recompensa.

English: Collect souls from boss masquerpets at the end of any dungeon on Hard or higher difficulty 20 times, and return to me for a reward.
Portuguese: Colete almas de chefes masquerpets no final de qualquer masmorra na dificuldade Difícil ou superior 20 vezes e retorne a mim para uma recompensa.

English: Collect souls from boss masquerpets at the end of any dungeon on Extra Hard or higher difficulty 35 times, and return to me for a reward.
Portuguese: Colete almas de chefes masquerpets no final de qualquer masmorra na dificuldade Extra Difícil ou superior 35 vezes e retorne a mim para uma recompensa.

English: Collect souls from boss masquerpets at the end of any dungeon on Nightmare or higher difficulty 50 times, and return to me for a reward.
Portuguese: Colete almas de chefes masquerpets no final de qualquer masmorra na dificuldade Pesadelo ou superior 50 vezes e retorne a mim para uma recompensa.

English: The dungeons are filled with dangerous masquerpets. I understand if you do not wish to take the risk.
Portuguese: As masmorras estão cheias de masquerpets perigosos. Eu entendo se você não quiser correr o risco.

English: The threat from within the dungeons has been reduced thanks to you, hero. Please accept a weapon piercing card as thanks for your efforts!
Portuguese: A ameaça dentro das masmorras foi reduzida graças a você, herói. Por favor, aceite um cartão de perfuração de arma como agradecimento por seus esforços!

English: You haven't defeated the bosses yet? That's okay, just return once you have.
Portuguese: Você ainda não derrotou os chefes? Tudo bem, apenas retorne quando tiver terminado.

English: Collect souls from 5 dungeon bosses on any difficulty.
Portuguese: Colete almas de 5 chefes de masmorra em qualquer dificuldade.

English: Collect souls from 20 dungeon bosses on Hard or higher difficulty.
Portuguese: Colete almas de 20 chefes de masmorra na dificuldade Difícil ou superior.

English: Collect souls from 35 dungeon bosses on Extra Hard or higher difficulty.
Portuguese: Colete almas de 35 chefes de masmorra na dificuldade Extra Difícil.

English: Collect souls from 50 dungeon bosses on Nightmare difficulty.
Portuguese: Colete almas de 50 chefes de masmorra na dificuldade Pesadelo.

English: Daily Quests
Portuguese: Missões Diárias

English: Saving Private Leo
Portuguese: Salvando o Soldado Leo

English: Private Leo has been trapped in the dungeon and sent an SOS sign!\nPlease save Private Leo!
Portuguese: O Soldado Leo ficou preso na masmorra e enviou um sinal de SOS!_x000D_\nPor favor, salve o Soldado Leo!

English: Private Leo seems to be injured so please hurry!
Portuguese: O Soldado Leo parece estar ferido, então por favor, se apresse!

English: I have misjudged you! I’ll look for another person, now begone!
Portuguese: Eu te julguei mal! Procurarei outra pessoa, agora vá embora!

English: I've heard Private Leo has been successfully rescued! Please accept this reward!
Portuguese: Ouvi dizer que o Soldado Leo foi resgatado com sucesso! Por favor, aceite esta recompensa!

English: Has Private Leo been rescued yet?
Portuguese: O Soldado Leo já foi resgatado?

English: Visit dungeon NPC to learn all about Event
Portuguese: Visite o NPC da masmorra para aprender tudo sobre o Evento

English: Rescue the missing childrens
Portuguese: Resgate as crianças desaparecidas

English: The children from the town have gone missing... Please rescue them from the monsters!
Portuguese: As crianças da cidade desapareceram... Por favor, resgate-as dos monstros!

English: I need you to save $QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$ childrens in any dungeon, before midnight.
Portuguese: Eu preciso que você salve $QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$ crianças em qualquer masmorra, antes da meia-noite.

English: You can find childrens in any dungeon. They will be in a cage and you will just have to get the key from the boss to save them!
Portuguese: Você pode encontrar as crianças em qualquer masmorra. Elas estarão em uma gaiola e você precisará pegar a chave do chefe para salvá-las!

English: If I'm right, children's lives don't matter to you? No problem.
Portuguese: Se eu estiver certo, a vida das crianças não importa para você? Sem problemas.

English: You saved the childrens! Thank you very much, you're my hero!
Portuguese: Você salvou as crianças! Muito obrigado, você é meu herói!

English: Someone else saved them. You were too slow and incompetent.
Portuguese: Alguém mais as salvou. Você foi muito lento e incompetente.

English: I need to rescue $QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$ childrens in any dungeon by midnight.
Portuguese: Eu preciso resgatar $QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$ crianças em qualquer masmorra até a meia-noite.

English: Make Monster Shaved Ice
Portuguese: Faça Raspadinha de Monstro

English: It's definitely hot today.\nThere's a special food that can blow this heat away, do you want to know?
Portuguese: Está definitivamente quente hoje._x000D_\nHá um alimento especial que pode afastar esse calor, quer saber qual é?

English: Don't be surprised! It's Monster Shaved Ice!\nIt's a special recipe by me with monster ingredients.\nIf you want know how it tastes, go find the ingredients before the ice melts!
Portuguese: Não fique surpreso! É Raspadinha de Monstro!_x000D_\nÉ uma receita especial minha com ingredientes de monstro._x000D_\nSe quiser saber o sabor, vá buscar os ingredientes antes que o gelo derreta!

English: You're not curious? You must not be too hot...
Portuguese: Você não está curioso? Deve não estar muito quente...

English: Here you go! Hurry up and try it before it melts!
Portuguese: Aqui está! Rápido, experimente antes que derreta!

English: Oh why are you so late? Your ice already melted and it can't be used...
Portuguese: Oh, por que demorou tanto? Seu gelo já derreteu e não pode ser usado...

English: Are you still collecting?\nIf the ice melts, we can't make the shaved ice so hurry up!
Portuguese: Você ainda está coletando?_x000D_\nSe o gelo derreter, não podemos fazer a raspadinha, então apresse-se!

English: Defeat the monsters before the ice metls and return to Sotta\n(Can redo the quest if failed)
Portuguese: Derrote os monstros antes que o gelo derreta e retorne para Sotta_x000D_\n(Pode refazer a missão se falhar)

English: Coral Island
Portuguese: Ilha de Coral

English: Clouds Over Coral Island
Portuguese: Nuvens Sobre a Ilha de Coral

English: Hero, the clouds over the island to the southeast have finally cleared!
Portuguese: Herói, as nuvens sobre a ilha ao sudeste finalmente se dissiparam!

English: For the longest time we have been unable to travel to the famed Coral Island. I wonder who or what caused the clouds to dissipate?
Portuguese: Durante muito tempo, não conseguimos viajar para a famosa Ilha de Coral. Eu me pergunto quem ou o que causou o desaparecimento das nuvens?

English: Regardless of the reason, perhaps you should go pay a visit to the island and see what's new.
Portuguese: Independentemente da razão, talvez você deva visitar a ilha e ver o que há de novo.

English: Many years ago a skilled blacksmith from Darken City named BoBu traveled through the fog in search for rare materials. Go seek out Coral Island and see if BoBu managed to survive.
Portuguese: Há muitos anos, um habilidoso ferreiro da Cidade Darken chamado BoBu viajou pela névoa em busca de materiais raros. Vá até a Ilha de Coral e veja se BoBu conseguiu sobreviver.

English: I understand hero, Coral Island has been uncharted territory for many years... Come back to me if you change your mind.
Portuguese: Eu entendo, herói, a Ilha de Coral tem sido um território desconhecido por muitos anos... Volte para mim se mudar de ideia.

English: Hello there traveler, I didn't expect to see one of you so soon after the clouds around Coral Island were lifted...
Portuguese: Olá, viajante, não esperava ver um de vocês tão cedo após a dissipação das nuvens ao redor da Ilha de Coral...

English: Go seek out Coral Island and see if BoBu managed to survive.
Portuguese: Vá até a Ilha de Coral e veja se BoBu conseguiu sobreviver.

English: Find Your Bearings
Portuguese: Encontre Seus Pés

English: Long ago I sailed into the mist that surrounded this island, hoping to discover something new and untouched in the land of Madrigal.
Portuguese: Há muito tempo, naveguei pela névoa que cercava esta ilha, na esperança de descobrir algo novo e intocado na terra de Madrigal.

English: I found Coral Island nestled deep into the clouds, but something kept me from ever leaving.
Portuguese: Encontrei a Ilha de Coral aninhada nas profundezas das nuvens, mas algo me impediu de sair.

English: The mist that covered the island held some magic that prevented those who arrived from escaping.
Portuguese: A névoa que cobria a ilha tinha alguma magia que impedia aqueles que chegavam de escapar.

English: With Coral Island open to all, we may begin seeing more travelers arrive over time. For now, go introduce yourself to Sunny Pang. Sunny Pang will help you in your adventures around the island.
Portuguese: Com a Ilha de Coral aberta a todos, podemos começar a ver mais viajantes chegando ao longo do tempo. Por enquanto, vá se apresentar a Sunny Pang. Sunny Pang o ajudará em suas aventuras pela ilha.

English: Take your time, the island has a lot to offer. Come back to me when you are ready.
Portuguese: Leve o tempo que precisar, a ilha tem muito a oferecer. Volte para mim quando estiver pronto.

English: Wow, it's a real adventure! It's been so long since we've had anyone come visit Coral Island. I wasn't sure this day would ever come!
Portuguese: Uau, é uma verdadeira aventura! Faz tanto tempo desde que tivemos alguém visitando a Ilha de Coral. Eu não tinha certeza de que este dia chegaria!

English: Introduce yourself to Sunny Pang.
Portuguese: Apresente-se a Sunny Pang.

English: An Island Shrouded in Mystery
Portuguese: Uma Ilha Envolta em Mistério

English: Those who call Coral Island their home have been unable to explore the world due to a curse placed on the island many years ago.
Portuguese: Aqueles que chamam a Ilha de Coral de lar não puderam explorar o mundo devido a uma maldição colocada na ilha muitos anos atrás.

English: The cause of the cursed mist that has kept the Coral Island inhabitants trapped is unknown.
Portuguese: A causa da névoa amaldiçoada que manteve os habitantes da Ilha de Coral presos é desconhecida.

English: However with the mist cleared from around the island, we can finally welcome fresh new faces to help us defend our small village!
Portuguese: No entanto, com a névoa dissipada ao redor da ilha, finalmente podemos receber novos rostos para nos ajudar a defender nossa pequena vila!

English: Coral Island is a dangerous place. To prove you are an adventurer capable of surviving the dangers here, I want you to go explore the island and take down 200 of any kind of Atrox.
Portuguese: A Ilha de Coral é um lugar perigoso. Para provar que você é um aventureiro capaz de sobreviver aos perigos daqui, quero que você explore a ilha e derrube 200 Atrox de qualquer tipo.

English: We didn't expect everyone that arrived to be strong enough for this place. Perhaps you can return to Darken City.
Portuguese: Não esperávamos que todos que chegassem fossem fortes o suficiente para este lugar. Talvez você possa retornar à Cidade Darken.

English: I am impressed! Atrox are dangerous beasts known to cut down most creatures that approach them. You have proven yourself.
Portuguese: Estou impressionado! Os Atrox são feras perigosas conhecidas por derrubar a maioria das criaturas que se aproximam. Você provou seu valor.

English: Atrox are dangerous foes, you'll need to successfully defeat more of them to prove yourself to me.
Portuguese: Os Atrox são inimigos perigosos, você precisará derrotar mais deles para provar seu valor para mim.

English: Defeat 200 of any kind of Atrox, then return to Sunny Pang.
Portuguese: Derrote 200 Atrox de qualquer tipo, depois retorne a Sunny Pang.

English: Clear the Paths
Portuguese: Limpe os Caminhos

English: Word has been going around the village about a strong new visitor that can hold their own against the ferocities of Coral Island.
Portuguese: Corre pela vila que um novo visitante forte consegue se defender contra as ferocidades da Ilha de Coral.

English: The number of Tigars on the island have exploded recently, and we're not sure why. It's hardly safe to walk along the paths of Coral Island anymore.
Portuguese: O número de Tigars na ilha explodiu recentemente, e não sabemos por quê. Não é mais seguro caminhar pelos caminhos da Ilha de Coral.

English: If you are willing to help us, go hunt enough Tigars to keep our paths safe for a while. Around 300 should do.
Portuguese: Se você estiver disposto a nos ajudar, vá caçar Tigars suficientes para manter nossos caminhos seguros por um tempo. Cerca de 300 devem bastar.

English: Perhaps no one is powerful enough to defeat the Tigars.
Portuguese: Talvez ninguém seja poderoso o suficiente para derrotar os Tigars.

English: Incredible, thank you for your efforts! We can safely travel around the land paths of the island again.
Portuguese: Incrível, obrigado pelos seus esforços! Podemos viajar com segurança pelos caminhos da ilha novamente.

English: Tigars hide in the grass, waiting to strike their prey. In just one NaNosecond they pounce to attack.
Portuguese: Os Tigars se escondem na grama, esperando para atacar sua presa. Em um segundo, eles saltam para atacar.

English: Defeat 300 of any kind of Tigar, then return to Talus.
Portuguese: Derrote 300 Tigars de qualquer tipo, depois retorne a Talus.

English: Pirates and Their Pet
Portuguese: Piratas e Seus Animais de Estimação

English: Your reputation continues to grow in our little village, hero!
Portuguese: Sua reputação continua a crescer em nossa pequena vila, herói!

English: The Meral pirates of Coral Island have managed to tame a Lord Tigar. Those thieves have threatened to come rob and destroy our homes.
Portuguese: The Meral pirates of Coral Island have managed to tame a Lord Tigar. Those thieves have threatened to come rob and destroy our homes.

English: Defeat the pirates and their gigantic pet before they destroy everything we've built!
Portuguese: Derrote os piratas e seu gigantesco animal de estimação antes que destruam tudo o que construímos!

English: I wouldn't want to be eaten by a Lord Tigar either. Understandable.
Portuguese: I wouldn't want to be eaten by a Lord Tigar either. Understandable.

English: I knew you could do it, hero! For now we can rest, knowing that our village is safe from the Meral pirates and their Lord Tigar!
Portuguese: I knew you could do it, hero! For now we can rest, knowing that our village is safe from the Meral pirates and their Lord Tigar!

English: Merals and their pet Tigar are terribly powerful. You'll need to be strong to defeat them.
Portuguese: Os Merals e seu Tigar são terrivelmente poderosos. Você precisará ser forte para derrotá-los.

English: Collect 30 Pristine Pirate Lens from any kind of Meral, and a Gigantic Feline Fang from a Lord Tigar.
Portuguese: Collect 30 Pristine Pirate Lens from any kind of Meral, and a Gigantic Feline Fang from a Lord Tigar.

English: King of the Pirates!
Portuguese: Rei dos Piratas!

English: Woaw, welcome to Coral Island hero! Let me tell you a story of legend, if you don't mind.
Portuguese: Woaw, bem-vindo à Ilha de Coral, herói! Deixe-me contar uma história de lenda, se você não se importar.

English: Long ago, a huge Meral was once blessed by Shade. The Meral grew twisted and grotesque, but filled with dark power.
Portuguese: Há muito tempo, um grande Meral foi abençoado por Shade. O Meral se tornou retorcido e grotesco, mas cheio de poder sombrio.

English: Soon the Overlord Meral became the King of the Pirates of Coral Island, ruling with an iron hook.
Portuguese: Soon the Overlord Meral became the King of the Pirates of Coral Island, ruling with an iron hook.

English: Wehehehe, if you defeated that Overlord Meral maybe YOU could become King of the Pirates!
Portuguese: Wehehehe, if you defeated that Overlord Meral maybe YOU could become King of the Pirates!

English: I guess we will never know if the legend of the Meral King is true.
Portuguese: Acho que nunca saberemos se a lenda do Rei Meral é verdadeira.

English: Woah woah woah! You defeated the King of the Pirates? And that stone...
Portuguese: Woah, woah, woah! Você derrotou o Rei dos Piratas? E essa pedra...

English: It seems this one piece of stone is filled with purple magic... this is definitely the work of Shade.
Portuguese: Parece que esta pedra está cheia de magia roxa... isso é definitivamente obra de Shade.

English: Fufufu, the only thing that bothers me is that there is legend of a second piece of magic stone hidden on this island. Maybe one day the two of us will discover where it's hiding!
Portuguese: Fufufu, a única coisa que me incomoda é que há uma lenda sobre um segundo pedaço de pedra mágica escondido nesta ilha. Talvez um dia nós dois descubramos onde está escondido!

English: To find out if the legend is true, you'll need to defeat the Overlord Meral.
Portuguese: To find out if the legend is true, you'll need to defeat the Overlord Meral.

English: Defeat the Overlord Meral to collect the Purple Pirate Insignia.
Portuguese: Defeat the Overlord Meral to collect the Purple Pirate Insignia.

English: Island Delicacies
Portuguese: Delícias da Ilha

English: Ha! You have really made a name for yourself here on Coral Island, hero. Everyone has told me of the amazing feats you've accomplished.
Portuguese: Ha! Você realmente fez um nome para si mesmo aqui na Ilha de Coral, herói. Todos me contaram sobre os feitos incríveis que você realizou.

English: If you want to prove yourself further, help us defeat the legion of Naga that have taken over the island.
Portuguese: Se quiser se provar ainda mais, ajude-nos a derrotar a legião de Naga que tomou conta da ilha.

English: To safely take on the Naga, first you'll need to gather bait made of their favorite foods. You can make bait from any type of Kingster or Creper! Meet up with Pau Pau and he'll prepare everything.
Portuguese: Para enfrentar os Naga com segurança, primeiro você precisará reunir isca feita de seus alimentos favoritos. Você pode fazer isca de qualquer tipo de Kingster ou Creper! Encontre Pau Pau e ele preparará tudo.

English: Everyone's adventure comes to a close one day. That's alright, hero.
Portuguese: Toda aventura chega ao fim um dia. Tudo bem, herói.

English: Woaw, nice job hero! We can make plenty of bait with all this to lower the guard of the Naga! For now, take a rest. We'll make a plan of attack later.
Portuguese: Woaw, bom trabalho, herói! Podemos fazer muita isca com tudo isso para diminuir a guarda dos Naga! Por enquanto, descanse. Faremos um plano de ataque mais tarde.

English: Keep fighting Kingster or Creper until you've found enough bait.
Portuguese: Continue lutando contra Kingster ou Creper até encontrar isca suficiente.

English: Defeat any kind of Kingster or Creper until you've made 200 Island Bait.
Portuguese: Derrote qualquer tipo de Kingster ou Creper até fazer 200 Iscas da Ilha.

English: Lizard People
Portuguese: Povo Lagarto

English: I hope you're feeling rested after making all that bait with Pau Pau!
Portuguese: Espero que você esteja descansado depois de fazer toda aquela isca com Pau Pau!

English: It's time to go on the offensive and take down as many of the Naga as we can.
Portuguese: É hora de atacar e derrotar o máximo de Naga que pudermos.

English: Okay hero, go out there and defeat the Naga before they come eat us!
Portuguese: Ok, herói, vá lá fora e derrote os Naga antes que eles venham nos devorar!

English: The Naga are ferocious, there's no shame in saying no.
Portuguese: Os Naga são ferozes, não há vergonha em dizer não.

English: Incredible! Truly amazing! You've conquered the Naga, and nearly all of Coral Island!
Portuguese: Incrível! Verdadeiramente incrível! Você conquistou os Naga e quase toda a Ilha de Coral!

English: Hopefully soon our village can sleep without keeping one eye open.
Portuguese: Espero que em breve nossa vila possa dormir sem manter um olho aberto.

English: Keep going! You need to defeat more Naga.
Portuguese: Continue! Você precisa derrotar mais Naga.

English: Collect evidence of defeating at least 1000 Small Naga, Naga, or Captain Naga. After that, defeat the Lord Naga and Overlord Naga.
Portuguese: Collect evidence of defeating at least 1000 Small Naga, Naga, or Captain Naga. After that, defeat the Lord Naga and Overlord Naga.

English: Mission Improbable
Portuguese: Missão Improvável

English: Hahaha! I cannot thank you enough for all that you have done for our village, hero! Only the most powerful of masquerpets remain a threat to our village now.
Portuguese: Hahaha! Não posso agradecer o suficiente por tudo o que você fez por nossa vila, herói! Agora, apenas os masquerpets mais poderosos permanecem uma ameaça para nossa vila.

English: We rarely see the Dorian and Okean creatures approach the village. However with so many other Island evils defeated, I fear they may leave their lair to take advantage of the situation!
Portuguese: Raramente vemos as criaturas Dorian e Okean se aproximarem da vila. No entanto, com tantos outros males da ilha derrotados, temo que possam sair de seus covis para aproveitar a situação!

English: Go seek out where the Dorian and Okean live. We'll need as much information as we can get if we expect to defeat them!
Portuguese: Vá descobrir onde vivem os Dorian e Okean. Precisaremos de todas as informações que pudermos obter se quisermos derrotá-los!

English: What!? You can't possibly be scared of a few more masquerpets after all we've been through together!
Portuguese: O quê!? Você não pode estar com medo de mais alguns masquerpets depois de tudo o que passamos juntos!

English: Well done, hero! With this information we have a chance to defeat the Dorian and Okean before they can attack!
Portuguese: Muito bem, herói! Com estas informações, temos uma chance de derrotar os Dorian e Okean antes que eles possam atacar!

English: Keep searching, the Dorian and Okean make their homes in the waters of Coral Island.
Portuguese: Continue procurando, os Dorian e Okean fazem suas casas nas águas da Ilha de Coral.

English: Search for where the Dorian and Okean live.
Portuguese: Procure onde vivem os Dorian e Okean.

English: Surprise Attack!
Portuguese: Ataque Surpresa!

English: HOOWAH! I'm trembling with excitement!
Portuguese: HOOWAH! Estou tremendo de excitação!

English: With the information you've brought back, our village has a real chance to take down the Dorian and Okean before they get to us!
Portuguese: Com as informações que você trouxe, nossa vila tem uma chance real de derrotar os Dorian e Okean antes que eles cheguem até nós!

English: Go ahead and defeat as many Dorian and Okean as you can find, including their leaders! We trust you to take down the leaders, we'll be helping with the smaller ones in the back.
Portuguese: Vá em frente e derrote o máximo de Dorian e Okean que puder encontrar, incluindo seus líderes! Confiamos em você para derrotar os líderes, estaremos ajudando com os menores na retaguarda.

English: If we wait too much longer the Dorian and Okean will attack the village!
Portuguese: Se esperarmos muito mais tempo, os Dorian e Okean atacarão a vila!

English: It's been done, hero. We've defeated the Dorian and Okean, and can now rest easy.
Portuguese: Está feito, herói. Derrotamos os Dorian e Okean e agora podemos descansar tranquilos.

English: We're doomed... without your help we will never defeat the Dorian and Okean in time!
Portuguese: Estamos condenados... sem a sua ajuda, nunca derrotaremos os Dorian e Okean a tempo!

English: Collect trophies from any defeated Dorian and Okean, and defeat at least one Lord or Overlord of each!
Portuguese: Collect trophies from any defeated Dorian and Okean, and defeat at least one Lord or Overlord of each!

English: Inky Darkness
Portuguese: Escuridão Envolvente

English: I hope you are ready for our final challenge hero... According to legend, once every few hundred years the Sea King will release spawn onto Coral Island.
Portuguese: Espero que você esteja pronto para nosso desafio final, herói... Segundo a lenda, a cada poucos centenas de anos, o Rei do Mar libera sua prole na Ilha de Coral.

English: A strange darkness has began to fill the waters of Coral Island, so it seems as if the legend is true.
Portuguese: Uma estranha escuridão começou a preencher as águas da Ilha de Coral, então parece que a lenda é verdadeira.

English: Please help us stave off the spawn of the Sea King!
Portuguese: Por favor, ajude-nos a conter a prole do Rei do Mar!

English: Thank you! Find where the Sea King has released their spawn, and defeat as many as you can. Let BoBu know once you've finished!
Portuguese: Obrigado! Encontre onde o Rei do Mar liberou sua prole e derrote o máximo que puder. Informe BoBu quando terminar!

English: Soon the inky darkness will overflow Coral Island, and we will be engulfed...
Portuguese: Em breve, a escuridão envolverá a Ilha de Coral, e seremos engolidos...

English: Hohoho! You really do have a mysterious power within you, don't you hero?
Portuguese: Hohoho! Você realmente tem um poder misterioso dentro de você, não é, herói?

English: Will we become faceless like those that failed before us?
Portuguese: Nos tornaremos sem rosto como aqueles que falharam antes de nós?

English: Defeat 500 of any type of Kraken.
Portuguese: Derrote 500 Krakens de qualquer tipo.

English: The Sea King Returns
Portuguese: O Retorno do Rei do Mar

English: The great Sea King of Coral Island has finally returned to wreck havoc upon the land.
Portuguese: O grande Rei do Mar da Ilha de Coral finalmente voltou para causar estragos na terra.

English: The locals told me that getting near the beast could cause mortals to lose their mind...
Portuguese: Os moradores me disseram que se aproximar da besta poderia fazer os mortais perderem a mente...

English: This battle will take all the strength we can muster. If you make it out alive, go back to Darken City, and let the mayor know about all that happened here.
Portuguese: Esta batalha exigirá toda a força que pudermos reunir. Se você sair vivo, volte para a Cidade Darken e informe ao prefeito tudo o que aconteceu aqui.

English: The only path forward to end the curse of the Sea King is to slay the beast in its lair. Go forth and do the deed, for Coral Island!
Portuguese: O único caminho para acabar com a maldição do Rei do Mar é matar a besta em seu covil. Vá e faça a tarefa, pela Ilha de Coral!

English: Those who lose their mind to the Sea King are said to become faceless.
Portuguese: Dizem que aqueles que perdem a mente para o Rei do Mar se tornam sem rosto.

English: Welcome back from Coral Island, hero! And what a story to tell, it's true that Coral Island is a fascinating place.
Portuguese: Bem-vindo de volta da Ilha de Coral, herói! E que história para contar, é verdade que a Ilha de Coral é um lugar fascinante.

English: BoBu and the Coral Island villagers sent something by mail for you as a way to say thanks. Perhaps they were too shy to give it to you themselves!
Portuguese: BoBu e os moradores da Ilha de Coral enviaram algo por correio para você como forma de agradecimento. Talvez eles fossem muito tímidos para entregar pessoalmente!

English: The Sea King consumes all who look into the void.
Portuguese: O Rei do Mar consome todos que olham para o vazio.

English: Ultimate Crafting
Portuguese: Artesanato Supremo

English: Orbs of Power
Portuguese: Orbes do Poder

English: Your arrival has come at a critical time, hero. Bring me Ultima, and in return I shall grant you the key to ultimate power.
Portuguese: Sua chegada ocorreu em um momento crítico, herói. Traga-me Ultima e, em troca, eu lhe concederei a chave para o poder supremo.

English: Collect Ultima from the giant creatures that live on Coral Island, or from chests of plunder deep in The Wilds.
Portuguese: Colete Ultima das criaturas gigantes que vivem na Ilha de Coral ou dos baús de tesouro nas profundezas de The Wilds.

English: Without Ultima I cannot grant the ultimate power you seek.
Portuguese: Sem Ultima, não posso conceder o poder supremo que você procura.

English: Well done, hero... I bestow upon you the power of the Ultimate Orb. Combine this with Shining Oricalkum and obtain ultimate power!
Portuguese: Muito bem, herói... Eu lhe concedo o poder do Orbe Supremo. Combine isso com Oricalco Brilhante e obtenha o poder supremo!

English: I need more Ultima to complete the ritual.
Portuguese: Preciso de mais Ultima para completar o ritual.

English: Collect ten Ultima from the giants of Coral Island and treasure chests in The Wilds.
Portuguese: Colete dez Ultima dos gigantes da Ilha de Coral e dos baús de tesouro em The Wilds.

English: New Hero
Portuguese: Novo Herói

English: Your will and ability have proven you to be a master in both thought and deed. Now that you've shown your true strength, it is time for your final task.
Portuguese: Sua vontade e habilidade provaram que você é um mestre tanto em pensamento quanto em ação. Agora que você mostrou sua verdadeira força, é hora da sua tarefa final.

English: I need you to reach level 125 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!
Portuguese: Preciso que você alcance o nível 125 e traga $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Apenas um verdadeiro Herói pode fazer isso!

English: Reach level 125 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.
Portuguese: Alcance o nível 125 e traga $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.

English: New Year's Hunt
Portuguese: Caça de Ano Novo

English: Celebrating 2024, let's hunt 2024 monsters!\nWhat do you say?"
Portuguese: Comemorando 2024, vamos caçar 2024 monstros!_x000D_\nO que você acha?

English: "Great! I know you'll make it for sure!\nHere's to a new year full of adventures in 2024!!!"
Portuguese: Ótimo! Eu sei que você vai conseguir!_x000D_\nAqui está um novo ano cheio de aventuras em 2024!!!

English: "It's a shame, because I've got the best New Year's gift ever…"
Portuguese: É uma pena, porque eu tenho o melhor presente de Ano Novo de todos...

English: "You've done great~ Here's your New Year's gift~\nLet's see how lucky you are this year!!!"
Portuguese: Você fez um ótimo trabalho~ Aqui está seu presente de Ano Novo~_x000D_\nVamos ver quanta sorte você terá este ano!!!

English: "Are you still a long way off? We're running out of time! Please hurry up!"
Portuguese: Você ainda está longe? Estamos ficando sem tempo! Por favor, se apresse!

English: Defeat the monsters and return to Auxilior.
Portuguese: Derrote os monstros e retorne a Auxilior.

English: Collecting Candy Shells
Portuguese: Collecting Candy Shells

English: Madrigal is being polluted by discarded candy shells everywhere!! We need your help!!
Portuguese: Madrigal is being polluted by discarded candy shells everywhere!! We need your help!!

English: Thank you so much!! I won't forget your help!!
Portuguese: Thank you so much!! I won't forget your help!!

English: I have a special gift for you, but it's a shame...
Portuguese: I have a special gift for you, but it's a shame...

English: I'm so proud to see Madrigal cleaned up~!
Portuguese: I'm so proud to see Madrigal cleaned up~!

English: Hang in there!!
Portuguese: Hang in there!!

English: Collect the candy shells and return to Auxilior.
Portuguese: Collect the candy shells and return to Auxilior.

English: Spring Monster Ball
Portuguese: Spring Monster Ball

English: Hello Adventurer! Would you like to take a suggestion about hunting a stronger monster?
Portuguese: Hello Adventurer! Would you like to take a suggestion about hunting a stronger monster?

English: Great! Show me what you can do first!
Portuguese: Great! Show me what you can do first!

English: That's too bad, please join us next time!
Portuguese: That's too bad, please join us next time!

English: Thank you. Here is your Monster Ball. Please be cautious!\nNo one knows what kind of powerful monster will come out.
Portuguese: Thank you. Here is your Monster Ball. Please be cautious!\nNo one knows what kind of powerful monster will come out.

English: Are we there yet? We don't have much time.
Portuguese: Are we there yet? We don't have much time.

English: Complete all 3 missions.
Portuguese: Complete all 3 missions.

English: Couple Ring Hunt
Portuguese: Couple Ring Hunt

English: If you bring me the coupling, I will give you something really good. Go get it.
Portuguese: If you bring me the coupling, I will give you something really good. Go get it.

English: Thanks for granting my request. I've heard through the grapevine that there's been a lot of frauds playing with fake couple rings lately, so you'd better be careful.
Portuguese: Thanks for granting my request. I've heard through the grapevine that there's been a lot of frauds playing with fake couple rings lately, so you'd better be careful.

English: What? Where in the world is such a couple ring? So you're saying I'm lying? If you don't believe me, get off!
Portuguese: What? Where in the world is such a couple ring? So you're saying I'm lying? If you don't believe me, get off!

English: Did you manage to get the couple ring already? This is a fake! Didn't I warn you not to get scammed. But I'm giving it to you for your efforts, so take it.
Portuguese: Did you manage to get the couple ring already? This is a fake! Didn't I warn you not to get scammed. But I'm giving it to you for your efforts, so take it.

English: Still haven't found the coupling? Hmm...well, that could be... I mean, where would a legendary couple ring be so easy to find?
Portuguese: Still haven't found the coupling? Hmm...well, that could be... I mean, where would a legendary couple ring be so easy to find?

English: Hunt the monsters and gather couple rings!
Portuguese: Hunt the monsters and gather couple rings!

English: Roll your dice
Portuguese: Roll your dice

English: Complete all missions.
Portuguese: Complete all missions.

English: Couple Daily Quests
Portuguese: Couple Daily Quests

English: Hunt the monsters and gather couple rings!
Portuguese: Hunt the monsters and gather couple rings!

English: I'm so glad to see how in love you are. Go collect $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ from the Nyangnyangs in northern Flaris, then return to me.
Portuguese: I'm so glad to see how in love you are. Go collect $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ from the Nyangnyangs in northern Flaris, then return to me.

English: I can feel these charms emitting love waves. Soon everyone will know how special your love is!
Portuguese: I can feel these charms emitting love waves. Soon everyone will know how special your love is!

English: I'm sorry, were you unable to find the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$? Perhaps they only appear for those truly in love.
Portuguese: I'm sorry, were you unable to find the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$? Perhaps they only appear for those truly in love.

English: Bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me to prove the strength of your love!
Portuguese: Bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me to prove the strength of your love!

English: Kill Demian Thieves
Portuguese: Kill Demian Thieves

English: Welcome! Another request has come in to clear out $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$. Could you please work together to defeat the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and return to me once you are done?
Portuguese: Welcome! Another request has come in to clear out $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$. Could you please work together to defeat the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and return to me once you are done?

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted somewhere in Madrigal. Check your map for hints for where they may be hiding!
Portuguese: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted somewhere in Madrigal. Check your map for hints for where they may be hiding!

English: The power of your love have vanquished the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ threat, thank you!
Portuguese: The power of your love have vanquished the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ threat, thank you!

English: Were you unable to find and defeat $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ yet? Track them down to prove your love is true!
Portuguese: Were you unable to find and defeat $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ yet? Track them down to prove your love is true!

English: Find Love Fish
Portuguese: Find Love Fish

English: Have you heard of the legendary $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$? Legend has it that lovers who obtain the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ will be together forever.
Portuguese: Have you heard of the legendary $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$? Legend has it that lovers who obtain the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ will be together forever.

English: Wonderful! The $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ is said to swim near Zaoma's Refuge in the middle of the Leren Mountains.
Portuguese: Wonderful! The $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ is said to swim near Zaoma's Refuge in the middle of the Leren Mountains.

English: You've found the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$! Surely your love will be blessed to last forever.
Portuguese: You've found the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$! Surely your love will be blessed to last forever.

English: I don't see the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. If you have trouble finding it, search near Zaoma in the Leren Mountains.
Portuguese: I don't see the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. If you have trouble finding it, search near Zaoma in the Leren Mountains.

English: Bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me to prove the strength of your love!
Portuguese: Bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me to prove the strength of your love!

English: Kill Giggleboxes
Portuguese: Kill Giggleboxes

English: Kill Trangfoma
Portuguese: Kill Trangfoma

English: Kill Doridoma
Portuguese: Kill Doridoma

English: Kill Scorpicon
Portuguese: Kill Scorpicon

English: Kill Tombstone Bearer
Portuguese: Kill Tombstone Bearer

English: Kill Cardpuppets
Portuguese: Kill Cardpuppets

English: Kill Steam Walkers
Portuguese: Kill Steam Walkers

English: Kill Nutty Wheels
Portuguese: Kill Nutty Wheels

English: Kill Fefern
Portuguese: Kill Fefern

English: Kill Wagsaac
Portuguese: Kill Wagsaac

English: Kill Prankster
Portuguese: Kill Prankster

English: Collect Whispering Leaves from Risem
Portuguese: Collect Whispering Leaves from Risem

English: In their spare time, Risems collect leaves that whisper sweet nothings. Spread love around Madrigal by bringing these $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me!
Portuguese: In their spare time, Risems collect leaves that whisper sweet nothings. Spread love around Madrigal by bringing these $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me!

English: I'm so glad to see how in love you are. Go collect $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ from the Risems in Darken, then return to me.
Portuguese: I'm so glad to see how in love you are. Go collect $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ from the Risems in Darken, then return to me.

English: Can you hear the leaves speak? Soon everyone will know how special your love is!
Portuguese: Can you hear the leaves speak? Soon everyone will know how special your love is!

English: A Date on Mars!
Portuguese: A Date on Mars!

English: What could be more romantic than frolicking near the Bangs of Northern Flaris? A picnic outside of Mars Mine sounds outstanding!
Portuguese: What could be more romantic than frolicking near the Bangs of Northern Flaris? A picnic outside of Mars Mine sounds outstanding!

English: Wonderful, then the date is set. Enjoy your time sightseeing at the Mars Mine!
Portuguese: Wonderful, then the date is set. Enjoy your time sightseeing at the Mars Mine!

English: Not a fan of Bangs? Well, there's always the Nyangnyangs.
Portuguese: Not a fan of Bangs? Well, there's always the Nyangnyangs.

English: How was the date? Hopefully the Bangs weren't too distracting.
Portuguese: How was the date? Hopefully the Bangs weren't too distracting.

English: Oh, so the Bangs were too distracting after all. Maybe you need to take a cold bath?
Portuguese: Oh, so the Bangs were too distracting after all. Maybe you need to take a cold bath?

English: Go on a romantic date outside the entrance of Mars Mine!
Portuguese: Go on a romantic date outside the entrance of Mars Mine!

English: Welcome! Another request has come in to clear out $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$. Could you please slay the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and return to me once you are done?
Portuguese: Welcome! Another request has come in to clear out $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$. Could you please slay the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and return to me once you are done?

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted somewhere in Madrigal.
Portuguese: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted somewhere in Madrigal.

English: Some days we don't feel productive. I understand.
Portuguese: Some days we don't feel productive. I understand.

English: Collect Rainbow Flowers
Portuguese: Collect Rainbow Flowers

English: Welcome! We require flowers blessed by lovers. Could you please collect Rainbow Flowers, and return to me once you are done?
Portuguese: Welcome! We require flowers blessed by lovers. Could you please collect Rainbow Flowers, and return to me once you are done?

English: Wonderful! The rare flowers grow near the large tree in Saint Morning where no one flies.
Portuguese: Wonderful! The rare flowers grow near the large tree in Saint Morning where no one flies.

English: These flowers are perfect. With your help I can now bless all of Madrigal with love!
Portuguese: These flowers are perfect. With your help I can now bless all of Madrigal with love!

English: Oh no, that's not right. The flowers are in Saint Morning. If you get lost, remember to check your map!
Portuguese: Oh no, that's not right. The flowers are in Saint Morning. If you get lost, remember to check your map!

English: Head to the Plateau of Silence in Saint Morning, and retrieve the Wild Rainbow Flowers.
Portuguese: Head to the Plateau of Silence in Saint Morning, and retrieve the Wild Rainbow Flowers.

English: Collect Heart Charms from Nyangnyang
Portuguese: Collect Heart Charms from Nyangnyang

English: Nyangnyangs possess charms bursting with the power of love. With a few of these charms, you can show Madrigal how strong your love is!
Portuguese: Nyangnyangs possess charms bursting with the power of love. With a few of these charms, you can show Madrigal how strong your love is!

English: The Mystery of the Shady Eye
Portuguese: The Mystery of the Shady Eye

English: The Mystery of the Shady Eye (2)
Portuguese: The Mystery of the Shady Eye (2)

English: The Cursed Wing of Destiny
Portuguese: The Cursed Wing of Destiny

English: The Cursed Wing of Destiny (2)
Portuguese: The Cursed Wing of Destiny (2)

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the sixth floor of the Forsaken Tower.
Portuguese: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the sixth floor of the Forsaken Tower.

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the seventh floor of the Forsaken Tower.
Portuguese: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the seventh floor of the Forsaken Tower.

English: Disarming the Maleficars
Portuguese: Disarming the Maleficars

English: Disarming the Maleficars (2)
Portuguese: Disarming the Maleficars (2)

English: Stealing gems from the cursed guardian
Portuguese: Stealing gems from the cursed guardian

English: Stealing gems from the cursed guardian (2)
Portuguese: Stealing gems from the cursed guardian (2)

English: Herbology Class
Portuguese: Herbology Class

English: You can gather herbs with a hoe. Want to learn how to gather herbs?
Portuguese: You can gather herbs with a hoe. Want to learn how to gather herbs?

English: Good. Then go out into the field and try to gather some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Portuguese: Good. Then go out into the field and try to gather some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: There you go. It's easier than you think, isn't it? Just remember, the most important thing is to do 'a lot'.
Portuguese: There you go. It's easier than you think, isn't it? Just remember, the most important thing is to do 'a lot'.

English: Woodcutting Class
Portuguese: Woodcutting Class

English: You can chop trees with an axe. Would you like to learn woodcutting?
Portuguese: You can chop trees with an axe. Would you like to learn woodcutting?

English: Good. Then go out into the field and chop some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Portuguese: Good. Then go out into the field and chop some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: Mining Class
Portuguese: Mining Class

English: You can dig up ores with a pickaxe. Would you like to learn mining?
Portuguese: You can dig up ores with a pickaxe. Would you like to learn mining?

English: Good. Then go out into the field and try to dig some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Portuguese: Good. Then go out into the field and try to dig some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: Fishing Class
Portuguese: Fishing Class

English: Once you get to know thrill of fishing, it's hard to get away from it. What do you say, learn?
Portuguese: Once you get to know thrill of fishing, it's hard to get away from it. What do you say, learn?

English: Good. Then go to the nearest river and try fishing. Whether you succeed or fail, it'll help you a lot.
Portuguese: Good. Then go to the nearest river and try fishing. Whether you succeed or fail, it'll help you a lot.

English: Alchemy Class
Portuguese: Alchemy Class

English: Once you learn the alchemy, you can brew your own buff potion to carry with. Want to learn?
Portuguese: Once you learn the alchemy, you can brew your own buff potion to carry with. Want to learn?

English: Good. Try anything on the caldron nearby. Caldron is near the magic shop.
Portuguese: Good. Try anything on the caldron nearby. Caldron is near the magic shop.

English: Cooking Class
Portuguese: Cooking Class

English: Food is the basic of survival. Why don't you cook on your own?
Portuguese: Food is the basic of survival. Why don't you cook on your own?

English: Good. Try anything on the oven nearby. Oven is near the food shop.
Portuguese: Good. Try anything on the oven nearby. Oven is near the food shop.

English: Carpentry Class
Portuguese: Carpentry Class

English: You can make furniture out of wood. Would you like to learn carpenting?
Portuguese: You can make furniture out of wood. Would you like to learn carpenting?

English: Okay, try anything on the woodcutting tools nearby. The woodcutting tools are near the Housing Manager.
Portuguese: Okay, try anything on the woodcutting tools nearby. The woodcutting tools are near the Housing Manager.

English: Smithing Class
Portuguese: Smithing Class

English: You can make furniture out of wood. Would you like to learn carpenting?
Portuguese: You can make furniture out of wood. Would you like to learn carpenting?

English: Okay, try anything at the nearest crafting tool. The tools are near the jewelry.
Portuguese: Okay, try anything at the nearest crafting tool. The tools are near the jewelry.

English: Destroy the pumpkins 1
Portuguese: Destroy the pumpkins 1

English: Complete the mission.
Portuguese: Complete the mission.

English: Destroy the pumpkins 2
Portuguese: Destroy the pumpkins 2

English: Complete the mission.
Portuguese: Complete the mission.

English: Thanksgiving Turkey
Portuguese: Thanksgiving Turkey

English: Help the mayor cook his turkey for thanksgiving.\nHunt monsters (Lv. -10 to Lv. +10 from your level) to earn [Event] Turkeys.
Portuguese: Help the mayor cook his turkey for thanksgiving.\nHunt monsters (Lv. -10 to Lv. +10 from your level) to earn [Event] Turkeys.

English: Hello, adventurer! I'm planning to cook a turkey for the village. Do you have a moment to help?
Portuguese: Hello, adventurer! I'm planning to cook a turkey for the village. Do you have a moment to help?

English: Great! Actually, I tried to cook it myself, but while I left the ingredients outside, monsters stole them all! Can you help me get them back?
Portuguese: Great! Actually, I tried to cook it myself, but while I left the ingredients outside, monsters stole them all! Can you help me get them back?

English: That's a shame. I'll try to figure something out on my own.
Portuguese: That's a shame. I'll try to figure something out on my own.

English: Thank you so much! I can finish cooking in time. Happy Thanksgiving!
Portuguese: Thank you so much! I can finish cooking in time. Happy Thanksgiving!

English: Are you done yet? The villagers are eagerly waiting!
Portuguese: Are you done yet? The villagers are eagerly waiting!

English: Go out into the field and try to gather some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Portuguese: Go out into the field and try to gather some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: Go out into the field and chop some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Portuguese: Go out into the field and chop some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: Go out into the field and try to dig some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Portuguese: Go out into the field and try to dig some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: Go to the nearest river and try fishing. Whether you succeed or fail, it'll help you a lot.
Portuguese: Go to the nearest river and try fishing. Whether you succeed or fail, it'll help you a lot.

English: Try anything on the caldron nearby. Caldron is near the magic shop.
Portuguese: Try anything on the caldron nearby. Caldron is near the magic shop.

English: Try anything on the oven nearby. Oven is near the food shop.
Portuguese: Try anything on the oven nearby. Oven is near the food shop.

English: Try anything on the woodcutting tools nearby. The woodcutting tools are near the Housing Manager.
Portuguese: Try anything on the woodcutting tools nearby. The woodcutting tools are near the Housing Manager.

English: Try anything at the nearest crafting tool. The tools are near the jewelry.
Portuguese: Try anything at the nearest crafting tool. The tools are near the jewelry.

English: Hero Grade (2)
Portuguese: Hero Grade (2)

English: I need you to reach level 140 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!
Portuguese: I need you to reach level 140 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!

English: Reach level 140 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.
Portuguese: Reach level 140 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.

English: Hero Grade (3)
Portuguese: Hero Grade (3)

English: I need you to reach level 160 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!
Portuguese: I need you to reach level 160 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!

English: Reach level 160 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.
Portuguese: Reach level 160 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.

English: Rumble from the Depths
Portuguese: Rumble from the Depths

English: (H-Hiii…!) T-tremors... w-waves... taller than a Clockworks... (Gulp) A... a deafening noise... Wh-what’s going on?!
Portuguese: (H-Hiii…!) T-tremors... w-waves... taller than a Clockworks... (Gulp) A... a deafening noise... Wh-what’s going on?!

English: What?! You’re not aware??! But where have you been?! Honestly… We can never count on you to keep an eye on our precious world…
Portuguese: What?! You’re not aware??! But where have you been?! Honestly… We can never count on you to keep an eye on our precious world…

English: Well… listen. It doesn’t matter, I’ll need you. I have no idea what happened, or even where exactly… (hesitation) But I feel like the deafening noise came from the Krakens side.
Portuguese: Well… listen. It doesn’t matter, I’ll need you. I have no idea what happened, or even where exactly… (hesitation) But I feel like the deafening noise came from the Krakens side.

English: I would have gone myself, but you see… (looking away) I still have a lot to do, and there are other adventurers I need to take care of… (coughs) And don’t think I’m scared, okay! It has nothing to do with that, absolutely nothing!
Portuguese: I would have gone myself, but you see… (looking away) I still have a lot to do, and there are other adventurers I need to take care of… (coughs) And don’t think I’m scared, okay! It has nothing to do with that, absolutely nothing!

English: Find the location of the events and see what’s happening there
Portuguese: Find the location of the events and see what’s happening there

English: Ah! Finally, someone reliable! I knew I could count on you. Go quickly, check near the Krakens side, and come back to tell me what you find. I’m sure you’ll do an excellent job! But… be careful, alright? That rumble wasn’t normal...
Portuguese: Ah! Finally, someone reliable! I knew I could count on you. Go quickly, check near the Krakens side, and come back to tell me what you find. I’m sure you’ll do an excellent job! But… be careful, alright? That rumble wasn’t normal...

English: What?! You’re not going?! Really… We can’t count on anyone… Fine, do as you wish, but remember that this world needs protectors, not cowards. And don’t come complaining if things get worse without you!
Portuguese: What?! You’re not going?! Really… We can’t count on anyone… Fine, do as you wish, but remember that this world needs protectors, not cowards. And don’t come complaining if things get worse without you!

English: Starfish… coral… and all kinds of little sea things coming together to form… a portal?! This is insane… How could this be possible?!
Portuguese: Starfish… coral… and all kinds of little sea things coming together to form… a portal?! This is insane… How could this be possible?!

English: You’re back already? But… don’t tell me you haven’t checked out the source of that noise yet! We need to know what’s happening on the Krakens side. Go on, get moving! The world’s not going to protect itself, you know!
Portuguese: You’re back already? But… don’t tell me you haven’t checked out the source of that noise yet! We need to know what’s happening on the Krakens side. Go on, get moving! The world’s not going to protect itself, you know!

English: Magic water stone of Herneos
Portuguese: Magic water stone of Herneos

English: Hmm… If what you’re telling me is true, it would correspond to a well-known legend of Madrigal… Once upon a time, in the Old World, Herneos was a prosperous city where everyone dreamed of living, a true underwater paradise with magnificent architecture.
Portuguese: Hmm… If what you’re telling me is true, it would correspond to a well-known legend of Madrigal… Once upon a time, in the Old World, Herneos was a prosperous city where everyone dreamed of living, a true underwater paradise with magnificent architecture.

English: But one day, Shade pierced the glass bubble that protected Herneos from the depths of the ocean, and the city sank… along with its inhabitants. Since then, despite numerous searches, we have never found this lost city. But if you’re telling me a portal has opened…
Portuguese: But one day, Shade pierced the glass bubble that protected Herneos from the depths of the ocean, and the city sank… along with its inhabitants. Since then, despite numerous searches, we have never found this lost city. But if you’re telling me a portal has opened…

English: I’m afraid Shade has finally found a way to return to the city of Herneos… For what purpose? I have no idea, but we need to ensure it is indeed the city of Herneos…
Portuguese: I’m afraid Shade has finally found a way to return to the city of Herneos… For what purpose? I have no idea, but we need to ensure it is indeed the city of Herneos…

English: Bring back a magical water stone from the discovered location and have it analyzed by Dr. Estly
Portuguese: Bring back a magical water stone from the discovered location and have it analyzed by Dr. Estly

English: Ah, thank you! I knew you’d understand the urgency. If this really is a magical water stone from Herneos, then Shade’s reach might be spreading in ways we never expected… Please, bring back a stone as soon as you can. And be careful Herneos may be more dangerous now than we imagine.
Portuguese: Ah, thank you! I knew you’d understand the urgency. If this really is a magical water stone from Herneos, then Shade’s reach might be spreading in ways we never expected… Please, bring back a stone as soon as you can. And be careful Herneos may be more dangerous now than we imagine.

English: What?! You’re not interested in helping with this? You don’t understand this isn’t just some small errand! Herneos could be the key to untold mysteries… and maybe even threats. But fine, if you can’t be bothered, I’ll just have to find someone else…
Portuguese: What?! You’re not interested in helping with this? You don’t understand this isn’t just some small errand! Herneos could be the key to untold mysteries… and maybe even threats. But fine, if you can’t be bothered, I’ll just have to find someone else…

English: Ah, you've returned with the magical water stone! Thank you! I'll begin the analysis right away to confirm its origin.
Portuguese: Ah, you've returned with the magical water stone! Thank you! I'll begin the analysis right away to confirm its origin.

English: Back so soon? You don’t have the magical water stone yet? We’re counting on that stone to prove if it’s truly from Herneos. Shade’s power might be stronger than we thought, so time is crucial. Please, return as soon as you have it!
Portuguese: Back so soon? You don’t have the magical water stone yet? We’re counting on that stone to prove if it’s truly from Herneos. Shade’s power might be stronger than we thought, so time is crucial. Please, return as soon as you have it!

English: Under Shade's Command
Portuguese: Under Shade's Command

English: What?! Monsters? Whole hordes?! Listen… Shade must already be at work, and if she’s there, she won’t waste any time.
Portuguese: What?! Monsters? Whole hordes?! Listen… Shade must already be at work, and if she’s there, she won’t waste any time.

English: I’ll need you to return there. Observe, fight, assess their strengths… If these creatures are really under Shade’s control, we need to know what awaits us.
Portuguese: I’ll need you to return there. Observe, fight, assess their strengths… If these creatures are really under Shade’s control, we need to know what awaits us.

English: When you’ve dealt with the monsters, return to see Dr. Estly. He should have finished the analysis of the water by then, and we’ll finally know if this submerged city is indeed Herneos…
Portuguese: When you’ve dealt with the monsters, return to see Dr. Estly. He should have finished the analysis of the water by then, and we’ll finally know if this submerged city is indeed Herneos…

English: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s, $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT,2$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,2$s, $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT,3$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,3$s and return talk to Sovann.
Portuguese: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s, $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT,2$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,2$s, $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT,3$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,3$s and return talk to Sovann.

English: Excellent! I knew I could count on you. The creatures under Shade’s command won’t go down easily, but with your skills, I’m confident you can handle them. Go, and show them that we won’t back down! Once you've dealt with them, check back with Sovann.
Portuguese: Excellent! I knew I could count on you. The creatures under Shade’s command won’t go down easily, but with your skills, I’m confident you can handle them. Go, and show them that we won’t back down! Once you've dealt with them, check back with Sovann.

English: What?! You’re refusing?! Don’t you see how serious this is? Shade’s forces won’t stop they’ll only get stronger if we ignore them. Fine, if you’re not willing to help, I’ll find someone who is up to the challenge. But don’t forget you might regret standing by if Shade succeeds.
Portuguese: What?! You’re refusing?! Don’t you see how serious this is? Shade’s forces won’t stop they’ll only get stronger if we ignore them. Fine, if you’re not willing to help, I’ll find someone who is up to the challenge. But don’t forget you might regret standing by if Shade succeeds.

English: You’re back again? But… have you not dealt with those monsters yet? We need to know what we’re up against! Shade’s forces are growing stronger every moment you delay. Go back and finish the job! Time is of the essence, and the fate of Herneos depends on it!
Portuguese: You’re back again? But… have you not dealt with those monsters yet? We need to know what we’re up against! Shade’s forces are growing stronger every moment you delay. Go back and finish the job! Time is of the essence, and the fate of Herneos depends on it!

English: You did it! I knew you could handle those monsters! Thank you for stepping up when we needed it the most.
Portuguese: You did it! I knew you could handle those monsters! Thank you for stepping up when we needed it the most.

English: Seeking the Truth of Herneos
Portuguese: Seeking the Truth of Herneos

English: I’m afraid I don’t have the knowledge necessary to interpret the results correctly.
Portuguese: I’m afraid I don’t have the knowledge necessary to interpret the results correctly.

English: Listen, take this sample and bring it to Martinyc the historian of Flarine. Only she has the archives and the skills to compare and tell you what’s going on! If this water is really connected to Herneos, she’ll know.
Portuguese: Listen, take this sample and bring it to Martinyc the historian of Flarine. Only she has the archives and the skills to compare and tell you what’s going on! If this water is really connected to Herneos, she’ll know.

English: Take the analysis result to Martinyc the historian of Flarine
Portuguese: Take the analysis result to Martinyc the historian of Flarine

English: Thank you! I knew you’d understand the importance of this. Martinyc is our best hope for interpreting these results. Take the sample to her right away, and let’s hope she can shed some light on this mystery! The fate of Herneos could depend on it!
Portuguese: Thank you! I knew you’d understand the importance of this. Martinyc is our best hope for interpreting these results. Take the sample to her right away, and let’s hope she can shed some light on this mystery! The fate of Herneos could depend on it!

English: What? You’re turning this down? This is vital information that could unlock the secrets of Herneos! If you won’t help now, I don’t know what we’ll do. Fine, but don’t forget that knowledge is power, and you might regret passing on this opportunity!
Portuguese: What? You’re turning this down? This is vital information that could unlock the secrets of Herneos! If you won’t help now, I don’t know what we’ll do. Fine, but don’t forget that knowledge is power, and you might regret passing on this opportunity!

English: You’re back? But… have you not delivered the sample to Martinyc yet? We need her expertise to understand what the analysis reveals! Time is running out, and if this water is connected to Herneos, we need to act quickly. Go now, before it’s too late!
Portuguese: You’re back? But… have you not delivered the sample to Martinyc yet? We need her expertise to understand what the analysis reveals! Time is running out, and if this water is connected to Herneos, we need to act quickly. Go now, before it’s too late!

English: Trophies from the Depths
Portuguese: Trophies from the Depths

English: Hello, who are you?... Oh, you must be the adventurer Estly told me about! Nice to meet you. How can I assist you?
Portuguese: Hello, who are you?... Oh, you must be the adventurer Estly told me about! Nice to meet you. How can I assist you?

English: Oh, you want me to interpret the results of this analysis to check, using the archives, if this water is indeed from the city of Herneos?
Portuguese: Oh, you want me to interpret the results of this analysis to check, using the archives, if this water is indeed from the city of Herneos?

English: (Smirking) But nothing comes for free, you know! I heard there are all-new monsters, never seen before, over there…
Portuguese: (Smirking) But nothing comes for free, you know! I heard there are all-new monsters, never seen before, over there…

English: While I compare the results, could you bring me samples or souvenirs from each creature? That would allow me to enrich our archives on these strange appearances.
Portuguese: While I compare the results, could you bring me samples or souvenirs from each creature? That would allow me to enrich our archives on these strange appearances.

English: Bring back $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$, $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,2$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME,2$, $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,3$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME,3$
Portuguese: Bring back $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$, $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,2$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME,2$, $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,3$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME,3$

English: Ah, wonderful! I knew you’d be up for the task. These new creatures are unlike anything we've documented, so any samples you bring will be invaluable. While you’re collecting them, I’ll start the comparison. Come back once you have the items, and we’ll see what these archives reveal about Herneos.
Portuguese: Ah, wonderful! I knew you’d be up for the task. These new creatures are unlike anything we've documented, so any samples you bring will be invaluable. While you’re collecting them, I’ll start the comparison. Come back once you have the items, and we’ll see what these archives reveal about Herneos.

English: Really? You’re refusing? (Sighs) I suppose not everyone appreciates the importance of history… But fine, go ahead just remember that these discoveries are rare. Who knows if you'll get another chance to contribute to our knowledge of Herneos.
Portuguese: Really? You’re refusing? (Sighs) I suppose not everyone appreciates the importance of history… But fine, go ahead just remember that these discoveries are rare. Who knows if you'll get another chance to contribute to our knowledge of Herneos.

English: Ohhh, thank you for these souvenirs! I can finally… continue my collection... uh, enrich the city archives! (clears throat) Yes, of course, the archives!
Portuguese: Ohhh, thank you for these souvenirs! I can finally… continue my collection... uh, enrich the city archives! (clears throat) Yes, of course, the archives!

English: Ah, you’re back? But… I don’t see any of the samples I asked for. These souvenirs from the creatures are essential to my research, you know! Please, gather them quickly and return. The archives await your findings!
Portuguese: Ah, you’re back? But… I don’t see any of the samples I asked for. These souvenirs from the creatures are essential to my research, you know! Please, gather them quickly and return. The archives await your findings!

English: Unveiling Herneos
Portuguese: Unveiling Herneos

English: Ah, yes, the analysis results… So, according to our archives, the water you retrieved matches 100% with that of the city of Herneos! It is indeed it You should quickly go announce this news to Sovann !
Portuguese: Ah, yes, the analysis results… So, according to our archives, the water you retrieved matches 100% with that of the city of Herneos! It is indeed it You should quickly go announce this news to Sovann !

English: Go tell Sovann it is indeed Herneos
Portuguese: Go tell Sovann it is indeed Herneos
